title: Detect Secret Doors
data:
{{Obsolete}}

'''Detect Secret Doors''' was a level 1 [[Divinations]] spell which revealed all secret [[door]]s within a certain radius of you as though you'd located one with the [[Traps & Doors]] skill. 

It was formerly found in the following [[spellbook]]s:
*[[Book of Cantrips]]
*[[Book of Divinations]]
*[[Book of Surveyances]]

==History==
Detect Secret Doors was removed in [[0.6]] with the removal of the Divinations school of magic.

[[Category:Spells]][[Category:Obsolete spells]][[Category:Divination]][[Category:Level 1 Spells]][[Category:Obsolete]]
